about_the_game:
BRIEF EXPLANATION OF THE GAME:

Haus Of Irndrous is a horror game set in the 80s. Counting with a limited stamina and a flashlight that at certain times will be unusable, you will have to pass the game that has several sections, which each has its own puzzles and enemies, in addition to each section overcome will become more difficult than the previous one. The sections will have secrets of the story which by joining you can understand more clearly the same, you will find radios within the sections which contain dialogues that will tell you how to solve the puzzles and some will tell you the story of the game indirectly making you have to discover the enigma that is hidden behind the story of the Afgarn mansion and its inhuman experiments.





Ryle receives a strange letter from his father after not talking to him in years, while reading the letter, the letter said that things were not going well in the corporation where he works, after a long journey he enters the depths of the mansion of Afgarn to realize that the security protocol was active and had to find a key to get out of it, One of the rules of the protocol is "NOT to talk to any experiment" while he enters, he sees that there are still laboratories in which he realizes that they tried to improve the DNA of humans, giving this with a fateful result, returning to the aggressive experiments and with special qualities such that traverse objects is a possibility, and we do not know what more qualities contain. ..

Some clips from the game:

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: frequent violence or gore, general mature content.

About the Game


BRIEF EXPLANATION OF THE GAME:

Haus Of Irndrous is a horror game set in the 80s. Counting with a limited stamina and a flashlight that at certain times will be unusable, you will have to pass the game that has several sections, which each has its own puzzles and enemies, in addition to each section overcome will become more difficult than the previous one. The sections will have secrets of the story which by joining you can understand more clearly the same, you will find radios within the sections which contain dialogues that will tell you how to solve the puzzles and some will tell you the story of the game indirectly making you have to discover the enigma that is hidden behind the story of the Afgarn mansion and its inhuman experiments.





Ryle receives a strange letter from his father after not talking to him in years, while reading the letter, the letter said that things were not going well in the corporation where he works, after a long journey he enters the depths of the mansion of Afgarn to realize that the security protocol was active and had to find a key to get out of it, One of the rules of the protocol is "NOT to talk to any experiment" while he enters, he sees that there are still laboratories in which he realizes that they tried to improve the DNA of humans, giving this with a fateful result, returning to the aggressive experiments and with special qualities such that traverse objects is a possibility, and we do not know what more qualities contain. ..

name: Haus Of Irndrous

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB VRAM (Integrated Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM (Integrated Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Delve into a chilling psychological horror experience, set within the confines of a sinister mansion. Solve intricate puzzles, evade twisted adversaries—partially human animatronics—and unearth the truth behind your father's vanishing act. Brace for escalating challenges at every turn.
